name: Space Escape (Parzival22)
description:
Hey Everyone!

I am a graduate from Full Sail, This Project was made with a small team as our final. It was a process of a few months and I wanted to share it with this community to check out and provide any feedback. 

Most of us are not in consistent communication, so being able to change anything on the project is slim, it should run off most PC systems but of course always use caution.
